articles.description: Some Chelsea players have lawyers poring through their contracts, but not Romelu Lukaku.
articles.content:
The agents of some Chelsea players have contacted lawyers to assess their future options, but Romelu Lukaku has rejected the suggestion he wants to leave.
Chelsea face an incredibly uncertain future… [+1985 chars]
